BadgeDetail.Name: Computer Components
BadgeDetail.Description: Employer: This badge demonstrates the earner has a solid understanding of the fundamental components of a computer including the processor, memory, motherboard and secondary storage.

Task.Title: Computer Hardware Components
Task.Body: Produce a document that explains what each of the following components do and explain how they work:processormemorymotherboardsecondary storageWhen you have finished your document and exported as a PDF, select Start' above, add your PDF as evidence and select 'Claim'.
Task.HtmlBody:
Produce a document that explains what each of the following components do and explain how they work:

  • processor
  • memory
  • motherboard
  • secondary storage

When you have finished your document and exported as a PDF, select Start' above, add your PDF as evidence and select 'Claim'.
Task.TextileBody:
Produce a document that explains what each of the following components do and explain how they work:

* processor
* memory
* motherboard
* secondary storage

When you have finished your document and exported as a PDF, select Start' above, add your PDF as evidence and select 'Claim'.
